en.description: Melee Arcane that, on Melee Electricity Status, creates a 20% chance for elemental Melee Status Effects to apply to enemies within 20 meters for 18 seconds. This cannot refresh while active.

zh-hans.description:
近战触发电击异常时：有 20% 几率使 18 秒内近战攻击触发的元素异常施加于20米范围内的所有敌人上。
效果激活时无法刷新。
